name: electron-squirrel-startup
description: Default Squirrel.Windows event handler for your Electron apps.
author: Lucas Hrabovsky <lucas@mongodb.com> (http://imlucas.com)

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run depcheck
scripts.depcheck: depcheck --ignores="app,electron" || echo "!!! Dependency check failed, but the failure is ignored by now. This should be addressed in COMPASS-4772 !!!"
